modName: Champion Dragon Armor -Now with Dragonbone Weapon Support
summary: This is modified dragonplate and dragonscale armor.  Both version feature darkened dragon bones and gold plating on the metal area.  I also added the Imperial dragon insignia or optional Stormcloak insignia on the chest plate of the dragon plate armor.  Thanks to AeonVita, this mod will also texture his Dragon Weapon mod with the same theme.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 1.5
Now includes the dragonbone weapons with original bone colors and gold trim to match the optional armor of the same color scheme.


Huge thanks to AeonVita for giving permission to re-texture his dragon weapons.


DESCRIPTION:
With this armor mod your dragon armor now features darkened dragon bones to blend better with the leather, and gold plating on the metal areas.  On the Heavy dragonbone armor I added the dragon insignia (or optional stormcloak insignia) to the chest plate.  Now your armor is fit for a true champion.


HOW TO INSTALL:
Unzip the file, select the version that you would like to use and copy the texture folder into your D:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder (use your drive letter and system type).  Select yes if it ask you to over right files.

HOW TO UNINSTALL:
Open D:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor  (use your drive letter and system type) and delete the dragonbone and dragonscale folders.


**************************************************

OPTIONAL ADDONS:

DRAGONBONE WEAPONS TEXTURES!
These textures require the following mod to work:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1935

Install AeonVita\'s Dragonbone Weapons mod then install the textures from this mod into your data folder.
(Included with permission of Aeonvita)

STORMCLOAK ARMOR:
Install over dark armor, it will add the Stormcloak symbol to your chest plate rather than the imperial one.
author: JusticeAA
